venue.name: Lenny & Joe's Fish Tale in Madison

item.description:
Good Evening Coffee Talkers,

This Meet Up is planned to be an after event after hearing
Barbara Walters Book Signing.

I used to work in Southeastern Conn (Old Saybrook and then East Lyme)
For a few years, so there were a few times that I would stop at Lenny and Joe
Drive In on the way home.

http://www.ljfishtale...

www.ljfishtale.com/

Directions;

From the North (Middletown, Hartford & Mass)

Travel Rt 9 South to Route 95. Take 95 South to Exit 62

Left onto Hammonasett Connector

At First Traffic Light left onto Route 1 We are 1/4 mile on the left.

From the South (New York, Fairfield County & New Haven)

Travel I-95 North to Exit 62 Right onto Hammonasett Connector

At First Traffic Light left onto Route 1. We are 1/4 mile on the left!

From the East (New London, R.I., Boston & the Cape)

Travel I-95 South to Exit 62 Left onto Hammonasett Connector

At First Traffic Light left onto Route 1. We are 1/4 mile on the left.

Mike B

Assistant Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: This Meet Up will be after seeing Barbara Walters at the Madison Book Store. The Actual Meet Up time is a guestimate. Lenny and Joes in Madison is a small but very comfortable Drive In with limited seating.
item.why: Who wants to have some fish food at a shoreline town.
item.name: CT Gets some Fish after Listening to Barbara
